title: Why doesnt LOL have Razer Chroma keyboards intergration???
body: Like every other popular game has it, why doesnt lol yet??

replies.body:
Hey there,

There are currently higher priority projects that Riot are working on.

For example, the [LCU (League Client Update)](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update) that's currently in alpha.
